title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.7 - Fixed enclosures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.7 - Fixed enclosures

State Regulations

All required enclosures not necessarily open or openable in
the course of normal use of the machine by a customer shall be of substantial
construction, firmly and securely fastened, and removable or openable only with
the use of keys or tools. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
